scripts.build:devtools: npm run build --workspace=@cnstra/devtools-dto && npm run build --workspace=@cnstra/devtools && npm run build --workspace=@cnstra/devtools-transport-ws && npm run build --workspace=@cnstra/devtools-panel-ui
scripts.build:devtools-server: npm run build --workspace=@cnstra/devtools-dto && npm run build --workspace=@cnstra/devtools-server && npm run build --workspace=@cnstra/devtools-server-repository-in-memory
scripts.build:devtools-panel-ui: npm run build --workspace=@cnstra/devtools-dto && npm run build --workspace=@cnstra/devtools-panel-ui
scripts.demo: npm run build:example && npm run start:all --workspace=@cnstra/example-app
scripts.dev:electron: npm run dev --workspace=@cnstra/devtools-panel-ui & npm run dev --workspace=@cnstra/devtools-electron

scripts.publish:core: npm run build --workspace=@cnstra/core && npm publish --workspace=@cnstra/core --access public
scripts.publish:react: npm run build --workspace=@cnstra/react && npm publish --workspace=@cnstra/react --access public
